articles.title: Twitter says a 'security incident' led to private Circle tweets becoming public | Engadget - Engadget
articles.description: In an email the company sent to affected users, Twitter said a "security incident" led to Circle tweets becoming public..
articles.content:
Back in April, users found a bug
 with Twitters Circle feature that saw the platform expose private tweets to strangers. Now, nearly a month later, the company has finally commented on the issue. In… [+1176 chars]

articles.title: Russia’s Wagner group signals it will stay in Bakhmut after threat to quit - The Guardian
articles.description: Yevgeny Prigozhin drops plans to withdraw from devastated city after receiving promises of extra arms
articles.content: The head of Russias Wagner group appears to have ditched plans to withdraw his forces from Bakhmut, in eastern Ukraine, after receiving promises overnight that they would get all the arms needed to c… [+6953 chars]

articles.author: Ariana Garcia
articles.title: Why astronomers spotting a star eat planet is bad news for Earth - Chron
articles.description: For the first time ever, astronomers have discovered a star devouring its own planet. Earth may befall the same fate in the future.
articles.content: For the first time ever, a group of scientists caught a sun-like star devouring a planet. Unfortunately, the discovery may also foreshadow Earth's fate in about five billion years. In a study publish… [+3590 chars]
